segments.text: Hello . Can I speak to Kevin , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Joan Harris . I ’ m calling from St . Johns Hospital . Are you still interested in a job as a service technician ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have good news for you.You ’ Ve got an interview . Can you come to the Human Resources Office on Thursday at 9 30 am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: wow ! That ’ s great . Sure , I can . Where is the Human Resources Office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . I ’ ll be there on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . I ’ ll see you on Thursday at 9 30 .
segments.speaker: S1
